text: Hagi pristi vahetmima Aroni agehemo'zama ranra kumatamimofo hozafu hu mopama megagi'nea mopafima nemaniza vahe'mo'za, mago'a vahetami huhampri zamante'nege'za ne'zazmia eri'za ome zami'naze. Hagi ana ne'zana pristi nagapine, Livae nagapinema maka venenema zamagima avontafepima me'nea naga'mo'zage eri'naze.
